scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run build:esm" "npm run build:cjs" "npm run types" "npm run types -- --declarationDir ./dist/cjs"
scripts.build:esbuild:
esbuild src/index.ts --banner:js='import { createRequire as topLevelCreateRequire2 } from "module";
 const require = topLevelCreateRequire2(import.meta.url);' --bundle --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020
scripts.build:esm: npm run build:esbuild -- --outdir=dist --format=esm && npm run types
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run build:esm -- --watch" "npm run types"
scripts.start:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run build:cjs -- --watch" "npm run types"
scripts.test: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha --extensions ts --watch --watch-files src "src/**/*.test.ts"
scripts.test:file: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.test.json" NODE_ENV=test ts-mocha --extensions ts --watch --watch-files src
